tweet.text: Interested in going beyond the #Oscars buzz around #1917Movie? Check out "War, Neutrality, and Humanitarian Relief: The Expansion of US Diplomatic Activity during the Great War, 1914–1917," available at https://t.co/k59pQNw2Yw https://t.co/4USV3WVAUT
